title: BetterEDT
ErrorDownloadICalFile: Erreur lors du téléchargement du fichier iCal.
HowToGetICalLink: How to get the iCal link ?
InsertICalLink: Please enter a valid iCal link.
FirstStep: Step 1: Log in to the ENT and access your timetable with the "Planning 2X-2X" tab.
SecondStep: Step 2: In the timetable menu, click on the iCal button
ThirdStep: Step 3: Copy the entire iCal link.
FourthStep: Step 4: Paste the link into the application in the text box and save.
ImportantStep: IMPORTANT: Remember to update your timetable in \"Preferences\" each semester and change the iCal link in the application.
